mapper.select: select id,u_id,a_id,a_pv,b_id,b_pv,pv,DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y-%m-%d') created from j_bonus_scj where status = 1 and to_days(now()) - to_days(created) = 1
select id,u_id,a_id,a_pv,b_id,b_pv,pv,DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y-%m-%d') created from j_bonus_scj where status = 1 and YEARWEEK(date_format(created,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) ORDER BY created DESC

select u_id,a_id,IFNULL(SUM(a_pv),0.00) as a_pv,b_id,IFNULL(SUM(b_pv),0.00) as b_pv,IFNULL(SUM(pv),0.00) as pv from j_bonus_scj
and date_format(created, '%Y-%m') = #{month}
and status = 1
group by u_id
